amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute protects the rights of Federal employees, with certain specific exemptions, to act as representatives of their employee organizations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Ways and Means.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ways and Means amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
